data.name: Pedigree Tactics
data.detailed_description:
Pedigree Tactics is a combination Tactical RPG/Monster-breeder. Embark on a journey with a cast of over 100 colorful, hand-drawn creatures to recruit and fuse. Each one has a unique set of abilities, resistances, and weaknesses across 11 elemental types.

Battle in turn-based combat across over 20 maps, including elemental hazards that you'll have to adapt to or work around. Monsters who absorb a hazard's element could even get free healing from it instead.

Fusion is central to success. Your trusty starter will serve you well in the beginning, but you'll have to combine your monsters to make stronger ones in order to save the world. Offspring inherit their parents' abilities, so with careful breeding and battle strategy you can make a team that's truly a force to be reckoned with.

Features full support for both controller and mouse/keyboard input.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
